DynamicPermission.SQL:
DECLARE @PermissionIDs dbo.ListNVarchar100Type; INSERT INTO @PermissionIDs VALUES ('ITSMAuthor');
SELECT 'ITSMReleaseSharedReporter' AS PermissionIdent FROM usr.ITSM_FolderTreeView as itsmFolTre WHERE itsmFolTre.FolderTreeIdent = @ITSMCompanyIdent AND itsmFolTre.IsShareAmongAuthors = @StateOne AND EXISTS( SELECT NULL FROM usr.ITSM_GetAllowedFolderTreeByAccountAndPermission(@UserID, @FolderGroupSegmentIdent, @PermissionIDs) WHERE FolderTreeIdent = itsmFolTre.FolderTreeIdent )

DataSource.SQL:
DECLARE @NewITSMRelease_Title_ITSM NVARCHAR(255) = usr.GetResourceText('NewITSMRelease_Title_ITSM', @UserLanguageID)
SELECT ISNULL(CAST(( SELECT CAST(itsReq.[ID] AS NVARCHAR) + ' ' + itsReq.ReleaseName FROM usr.ITSMRelease AS itsReq WHERE itsReq.ID = @ID ) AS NVARCHAR(MAX)), @NewITSMRelease_Title_ITSM) AS Title

DataBind.SQL:
DECLARE @PermissionIDs dbo.ListNVarchar100Type; INSERT INTO @PermissionIDs VALUES ('ITSMAuthor');
SELECT itsmFolPer.FolderTreeIdent AS Ident , itsmFolPer.FolderName AS [Name] FROM usr.ITSM_GetAllowedFolderTreeByAccountAndPermission(ISNULL(@AccountID,@UserID),@FolderGroupSegmentIdent,@PermissionIDs) as itsmFolPer WHERE itsmFolPer.FolderLevel = @Level AND itsmFolPer.FolderName LIKE @ITSMCompanyIdent

SelectedDataBind.SQL: SELECT fot.Ident , fol.[Name] FROM dbo.Folder AS fol INNER JOIN dbo.FolderTree AS fot ON fot.FolderID = fol.ID WHERE fot.Ident = @ITSMCompanyIdent

DataBind.SQL:
DECLARE @PermissionIDs dbo.ListNVarchar100Type; INSERT INTO @PermissionIDs VALUES ('ITSMAuthor');
SELECT itsmFolPer.FolderTreeIdent AS Ident , itsmFolPer.FolderName AS [Name] FROM usr.ITSM_GetAllowedFolderTreeByAccountAndPermission(ISNULL(@AccountID,@UserID),@FolderGroupSegmentIdent,@PermissionIDs) as itsmFolPer WHERE itsmFolPer.FolderLevel = @Level AND itsmFolPer.ParentFolderTreeIdent = @ITSMCompanyIdent

DECLARE @PermissionIDs dbo.ListNVarchar100Type; INSERT INTO @PermissionIDs VALUES ('ITSMAuthor');
SELECT itsmFolPer.FolderTreeIdent AS Ident , itsmFolPer.FolderName AS [Name] FROM usr.ITSM_GetAllowedFolderTreeByAccountAndPermission(ISNULL(@AccountID,@UserID),@FolderGroupSegmentIdent,@PermissionIDs) as itsmFolPer WHERE itsmFolPer.FolderLevel = @Level AND itsmFolPer.ParentFolderTreeIdent = @ITSMCategoryLevel2Ident

DECLARE @PermissionIDs dbo.ListNVarchar100Type; INSERT INTO @PermissionIDs VALUES ('ITSMAuthor');
SELECT itsmFolPer.FolderTreeIdent AS Ident , itsmFolPer.FolderName AS [Name] FROM usr.ITSM_GetAllowedFolderTreeByAccountAndPermission(ISNULL(@AccountID,@UserID),@FolderGroupSegmentIdent,@PermissionIDs) as itsmFolPer WHERE itsmFolPer.FolderLevel = @Level AND itsmFolPer.ParentFolderTreeIdent = @ITSMCategoryLevel3Ident

DECLARE @PermissionIDs dbo.ListNVarchar100Type; INSERT INTO @PermissionIDs VALUES ('ITSMAuthor');
SELECT itsmFolPer.FolderTreeIdent AS Ident , itsmFolPer.FolderName AS [Name] FROM usr.ITSM_GetAllowedFolderTreeByAccountAndPermission(ISNULL(@AccountID,@UserID),@FolderGroupSegmentIdent,@PermissionIDs) as itsmFolPer WHERE itsmFolPer.FolderLevel = @Level AND itsmFolPer.ParentFolderTreeIdent = @ITSMCategoryLevel4Ident
SELECT ID, FullName FROM dbo.Account WHERE FullName LIKE @ReporterAccountID AND [State] = @ActiveState

SelectedDataBind.SQL: SELECT ID, FullName FROM dbo.Account WHERE ID = @ReporterAccountID

DataBind.SQL: SELECT Email AS ReporterEmail FROM dbo.Account WHERE ID = @ReporterAccountID
SELECT Phone AS ReporterPhone FROM dbo.Account WHERE ID = @ReporterAccountID

DataSource.SQL: SELECT ISNULL(itsReq.[State], 1) AS [State] FROM (VALUES (0)) AS dual(zero) LEFT JOIN usr.ITSMRelease AS itsReq ON itsReq.ID = @ID

SELECT itsGsc.SLAType -- CONCAT(, '_SLAType_ITSM') AS SLAType ,itsGsc.SLAStatus --CONCAT(, '_SLAType_ITSM') AS SLAStatus ,itsGsc.FinishTime AS SLADate ,itsGsc.TimeSpent AS SLASpentTime ,itsGsc.PercentSpent AS SLASpentPercent ,itsGsc.TimeRemain AS SLARemainingTime ,itsGsc.PercentRemain AS SLARemainingPercent ,itsGsc.SLAName AS CalendarName ,CONCAT('bg-', itsGsc.SLAStatusColorCssClass) AS SLAStatusColorCssClass FROM usr.ITSMRelease AS itsReq OUTER APPLY usr.ITSM_GetSLAComputes (itsReq.ID, 'ITSMRelease', NULL) AS itsGsc WHERE itsReq.ID = @ID AND itsGsc.SLAName IS NOT NULL ORDER BY itsGsc.SLATypePriority

DataBind.SQL:
DECLARE @PermissionIDs dbo.ListNVarchar100Type; INSERT INTO @PermissionIDs VALUES ('ITSMAuthor');
SELECT IIF( EXISTS( SELECT NULL FROM usr.ITSM_GetAllowedFolderTreeByAccountAndPermission(ISNULL(@AccountID,@UserID),@FolderGroupSegmentIdent,@PermissionIDs) WHERE FolderLevel = @Level AND ParentFolderTreeIdent = @ITSMCategoryLevel4Ident ) , 1 , 0 ) AS IsShowCategoryLevel5

DECLARE @PermissionIDs dbo.ListNVarchar100Type; INSERT INTO @PermissionIDs VALUES ('ITSMSpecialist'), ('ITSMOperator'), ('ITSMAuthor');
SELECT itsm.SourceID AS ID ,CONCAT(itsm.ITSMKey,' - ',itsm.[Subject]) AS [ITSMTitle] FROM usr.ITSM_FormFullView AS itsm WHERE ( itsm.ITSMKey LIKE @ParentITSMID OR itsm.[Subject] LIKE @ParentITSMID ) AND itsm.SourceID != ISNULL(@ID, -1) AND itsm.SourceFormIdent = @SourceFormIdent AND itsm.LastFolderTreeIdent IN ( SELECT FolderTreeIdent FROM usr.ITSM_GetAllowedFolderTreeByAccountAndPermission(@UserID, @FolderGroupSegmentIdent, @PermissionIDs) )

SelectedDataBind.SQL: SELECT itsm.SourceID AS ID ,CONCAT(itsm.ITSMKey,' - ',itsm.[Subject]) AS [ITSMTitle] FROM usr.ITSM_FormFullView AS itsm WHERE itsm.SourceID = @ParentITSMID AND itsm.SourceFormIdent = @SourceFormIdent

DataSource.SQL: DECLARE @ThisID_ITSM VARCHAR(255) = usr.GetResourceText('ThisID_ITSM', @UserLanguageID); SELECT itsmLinSbf.ID ,itsmLit.TextValue AS ITSMLinkTypeIdent ,IIF(itsmS.SourceID = @ID, @ThisID_ITSM, CONCAT('', itsmS.[ITSMKey], '') ) AS SourceITSMID ,IIF(itsmT.SourceID = @ID, @ThisID_ITSM, CONCAT('', itsmT.[ITSMKey], '') ) AS TargetITSMID FROM usr.ITSMLinkSubform AS itsmLinSbf INNER JOIN usr.ITSM_FormFullView AS itsmS ON itsmS.SourceID = itsmLinSbf.SourceITSMID AND itsmS.SourceFormIdent = itsmLinSbf.FormIdent INNER JOIN usr.ITSM_FormFullView AS itsmT ON itsmT.SourceID = itsmLinSbf.TargetITSMID AND itsmT.SourceFormIdent = itsmLinSbf.FormIdent INNER JOIN usr.ITSMLinkType AS itsmLit ON itsmLit.Ident = itsmLinSbf.ITSMLinkTypeIdent AND itsmLit.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID WHERE itsmLinSbf.[State] != @DeletedState AND (itsmLinSbf.SourceITSMID = @ID OR itsmLinSbf.TargetITSMID = @ID) AND itsmLinSbf.FormIdent = @FormIdent

dsf:From.dsf:SQL: LEFT JOIN usr.ITSM_FolderTreeView AS ftvCat3 ON ftvCat3.FolderTreeIdent = itsReq.ITSMCategoryLevel3Ident
LEFT JOIN usr.ITSM_FolderTreeView AS ftvCat4 ON ftvCat4.FolderTreeIdent = itsReq.ITSMCategoryLevel4Ident
LEFT JOIN dbo.Account AS accReporter ON accReporter.ID = itsReq.ReporterAccountID
INNER JOIN usr.ITSM_FolderTreeView AS ftvCom ON ftvCom.FolderTreeIdent = itsReq.ITSMCompanyIdent

DataSource.SQL:
DECLARE @Team_ITSM VARCHAR(255) = usr.GetResourceText('Team_ITSM', @UserLanguageID);
SELECT itsReq.ID ,'ITSMRelease' AS FormIdent #ADDCOLUMN# FROM usr.ITSMRelease AS itsReq #ADDFROM# WHERE itsReq.[State] != @DeletedState AND itsReq.ParentITSMID = @ID AND #PERMISSION[ITSMRelease(itsReq)]#

DataBind.SQL: SELECT ID, FullName FROM dbo.Account WHERE FullName LIKE @ReleaseManagerID AND [State] = @ActiveState ORDER BY FullName ASC

SelectedDataBind.SQL: SELECT ID, FullName FROM dbo.Account WHERE ID = @ReleaseManagerID

DataBind.SQL: SELECT ID, CONCAT(ITSMKey,' - ',[Subject]) AS [Subject] FROM usr.ITSMChange WHERE ( ITSMKey LIKE @ITSMChangeID OR [Subject] LIKE @ITSMChangeID ) AND [State] != @DeletedState ORDER BY CONCAT(ITSMKey,' - ',[Subject]) ASC

SelectedDataBind.SQL: SELECT ID, CONCAT(ITSMKey,' - ',[Subject]) AS [Subject] FROM usr.ITSMChange WHERE ID = @ITSMChangeID

DataBind.SQL: SELECT dialsetting.Guid, dial.TextValue FROM usr.ITSMReleaseClassificationCategory AS dial INNER JOIN usr.ITSMReleaseClassificationCategorySetting AS dialsetting ON dialsetting.Guid = dial.Guid WHERE dial.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID AND dial.[State] != @DeletedState ORDER BY dial.OrderValue ASC

TimeLineDataBind.SQL: SET @Result = ( SELECT dial.TextValue FROM usr.ITSMReleaseClassificationCategory AS dial INNER JOIN usr.ITSMReleaseClassificationCategorySetting AS dialsetting ON dialsetting.Guid = dial.Guid WHERE dial.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID AND dial.[State] != 0 AND CAST(dialsetting.Guid AS VARCHAR(MAX)) = @Value )

DataBind.SQL: SELECT dialsetting.Guid, dial.TextValue FROM usr.ITSMReleaseDeploymentType AS dial INNER JOIN usr.ITSMReleaseDeploymentTypeSetting AS dialsetting ON dialsetting.Guid = dial.Guid WHERE dial.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID AND dial.[State] != @DeletedState ORDER BY dial.OrderValue ASC

TimeLineDataBind.SQL: SET @Result = ( SELECT dial.TextValue FROM usr.ITSMReleaseDeploymentType AS dial INNER JOIN usr.ITSMReleaseDeploymentTypeSetting AS dialsetting ON dialsetting.Guid = dial.Guid WHERE dial.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID AND dial.[State] != 0 AND CAST(dialsetting.Guid AS VARCHAR(MAX)) = @Value )

DataBind.SQL: SELECT dialsetting.Guid, dial.TextValue FROM usr.ITSMOperationalEnvironmentType AS dial INNER JOIN usr.ITSMOperationalEnvironmentTypeSetting AS dialsetting ON dialsetting.Guid = dial.Guid WHERE dial.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID AND dial.[State] != @DeletedState ORDER BY dial.OrderValue ASC

TimeLineDataBind.SQL: SET @Result = ( SELECT dial.TextValue FROM usr.ITSMOperationalEnvironmentType AS dial INNER JOIN usr.ITSMOperationalEnvironmentTypeSetting AS dialsetting ON dialsetting.Guid = dial.Guid WHERE dial.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID AND dial.[State] != 0 AND CAST(dialsetting.Guid AS VARCHAR(MAX)) = @Value )

DataBind.SQL: SELECT dialsetting.Guid, dial.TextValue FROM usr.ITSMReleaseApprovalDecisionResult AS dial INNER JOIN usr.ITSMReleaseApprovalDecisionResultSetting AS dialsetting ON dialsetting.Guid = dial.Guid WHERE dial.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID AND dial.[State] != @DeletedState ORDER BY dial.OrderValue ASC

TimeLineDataBind.SQL: SET @Result = ( SELECT dial.TextValue FROM usr.ITSMReleaseApprovalDecisionResult AS dial INNER JOIN usr.ITSMReleaseApprovalDecisionResultSetting AS dialsetting ON dialsetting.Guid = dial.Guid WHERE dial.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID AND dial.[State] != 0 AND CAST(dialsetting.Guid AS VARCHAR(MAX)) = @Value )

DataBind.SQL: SELECT dialsetting.Guid, dial.TextValue FROM usr.ITSMReleaseTestSummaryConclusion AS dial INNER JOIN usr.ITSMReleaseTestSummaryConclusionSetting AS dialsetting ON dialsetting.Guid = dial.Guid WHERE dial.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID AND dial.[State] != @DeletedState ORDER BY dial.OrderValue ASC

TimeLineDataBind.SQL: SET @Result = ( SELECT dial.TextValue FROM usr.ITSMReleaseTestSummaryConclusion AS dial INNER JOIN usr.ITSMReleaseTestSummaryConclusionSetting AS dialsetting ON dialsetting.Guid = dial.Guid WHERE dial.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID AND dial.[State] != 0 AND CAST(dialsetting.Guid AS VARCHAR(MAX)) = @Value )

DataBind.SQL: SELECT dialsetting.Guid, dial.TextValue FROM usr.ITSMReleaseTestExecutionResult AS dial INNER JOIN usr.ITSMReleaseTestExecutionResultSetting AS dialsetting ON dialsetting.Guid = dial.Guid WHERE dial.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID AND dial.[State] != @DeletedState ORDER BY dial.OrderValue ASC

TimeLineDataBind.SQL: SET @Result = ( SELECT dial.TextValue FROM usr.ITSMReleaseTestExecutionResult AS dial INNER JOIN usr.ITSMReleaseTestExecutionResultSetting AS dialsetting ON dialsetting.Guid = dial.Guid WHERE dial.LanguageID = @UserLanguageID AND dial.[State] != 0 AND CAST(dialsetting.Guid AS VARCHAR(MAX)) = @Value )
SET @Result = ( SELECT usr.GetResourceText( CASE @Value WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes_ITSM' WHEN 0 THEN 'No_ITSM' END ,@UserLanguageID) )
